Class WinSmugglersState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.AdventureState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.SmugglersStates.WinSmugglersState
public class WinSmugglersState extends AdventureState
Adventure state triggered when a player wins a confrontation against a Smugglers card.

In this state, the player is presented with a binary choice: whether to accept the smugglers' materials reward. If the player accepts, they gain movement on the main track and proceed to the ChooseMaterialsSmugglers state to pick materials. If the player declines, the state transitions directly to IdleState.

This state is reached from SmugglersState when the player's firepower exceeds that of the smugglers.

Invariants

  • player != null
  • smugglers != null
  • gameModel != null

      Throws:

  • Method Details

    • rewardDecision

      public Player rewardDecision(String username, boolean decision)
      Processes the player's decision whether to accept the smugglers' reward.

      If the player accepts:

      • They gain movement on the main track equal to -lostDays from the card.
      • The state transitions to ChooseMaterialsSmugglers to select the materials.
      If the player refuses:
      • The game skips the reward and moves directly to IdleState.
      Overrides:
      rewardDecision in class AdventureState
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player making the decision
      decision - true if the player accepts the reward, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the updated Player object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the username does not match the expected player
